titles: The fast: As it was delivered in a sermon at St. Margarets in Westminster, before the honorable House of Commons upon Wednesday the 12th. of June 1661. being the day appointed by His Majesty and the Parliament, for a solemn humiliation upon the late abundance of rain, and the danger of famine, and pestilence likely to ensue thereby. / By Tho: Grenfield A.M. Preacher to the Honorable Society of Lincoln's-Inne.
author: Grenfield, Thomas.
publisher: Printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-lane,
notes: Incorrectly identified as Wing G1937 on UMI microfilm, reel 1462:13.
Reproductions of original in Harvard University Library (reels 1462:13 and 1794:9), Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2922:8) and Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library (reel 2977:26).
